title: Filter chips: UX example
code:
<gds-flex
  padding="xl"
  width="100%"
  justify-content="center"
  alig-items="center"
>
  <gds-filter-chips value="us-dollar">
    <gds-filter-chip size="small" value="us-dollar">US-dollar</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">British Virgin Islands</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">Normal account</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">High risk</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">Global</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">Emerging markets</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">Equity funds</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">Biotechnology</gds-filter-chip>
  </gds-filter-chips>
</gds-flex>
